settings.tab_content_1:
A fully customizable non-electric smart mattress.

  • A mattress that allows you to adjust firmness to fit any sleeping preference or mood
  • Choose between levels of firmness or softness on either side of the bed
  • Titanium-infused foam for extra cooling and optimal pressure relief

Expected Delivery: Arrives within 7 business days.
settings.tab_content_2:
• Sleepers who have struggled to find the perfect mattress and value personalized comfort and support
  • Couples with different firmness preferences
  • Sleepers who want to stay cool all night long

settings.heading: Fine tune your perfect mattress
settings.content: With the customisable Emma Shift mattress, you can adjust the firmness or softness to every imaginable level until you find what‚Äôs perfect for you. What‚Äôs even better is that you and your partner can have different firmness levels on both sides of the mattress, controlled by your own individual Smart Valves. This Smart Valve allows you to shift the internal pressure of the mattress whenever you want to.

settings.heading: Get the best of air technology and foam
settings.content: The Emma Shift gives you the benefits of advanced air technology and foam, all in one. Soft enough to cushion your sensitive pressure points and firm enough to support your spine, this superior mattress eliminates back pain and joint pain. If you‚Äôre unsure of how firm or soft you want your mattress, you can adjust it any time with the Smart Valve. And if your sleeping patterns change, the graphite- and titanium-infused visco-elastic foam layer will mold around your new position.

settings.heading: Customisable through the years
settings.content: As you go through different life stages and ages, your body has different needs in a mattress. The Emma Shift is made of top quality foams that are engineered to withstand various durability tests. And, with adjustable firmness levels, you can change your mattress to suit your life stage rather than replacing it.

settings.title: The cover that‚Äôs plush and moisture-wicking
settings.content: The Emma cover is cool-to-touch, making it very comfortable to lie on.

settings.title: The cool foam layer that isolates motion
settings.content: Graphite- and titanium-infused visco-elastic foam keeps you cool and helps your body move effortlessly and roll over easily while you sleep.

settings.title: The layer with supporting points
settings.content: The Shift Core is a layer of large pore foam with an internal pressure that is controlled by body weight, allowing the mattress to be made harder or softer for specific areas of the body.

settings.title: Smart Valve technology for adjustable comfort
settings.content: The Smart Valve is a control system that allows you to manually adjust the firmness or softness of the mattress infinitely and without using energy or electricity.

settings.title: The base foam that keeps your spine aligned
settings.content: Durable comfort foam provides fundamental support.

settings.title: The edge of the mattress with added support
settings.content: A reinforced perimeter at the head and foot of the bed helps you sit up and get out of bed in the morning.

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same
settings.subtitle: Experience rave-worthy comfort on a mattress that suits your every sleep need

settings.title: How does the Emma Shift feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: The Emma Shift uses a Smart Valve control system that allows you to manually adjust the firmness or softness of the mattress infinitely and without using energy or electricity. You can choose your own level of comfort without compromising on fundamental support!

settings.title: How exactly does the Smart Valve technology work?
settings.content: If you want to adjust the firmness of your mattress, lie on the mattress, open the Smart Valve fully and press it. The Shift Core Technology will enable you to feel your mattress become softer on the most important pressure points of your body within 10 seconds. If you want the mattress to be firmer again, get up from the mattress, open the Smart Valve, and press it to re-inflate the Shift Core.

settings.title: Is the Emma Shift suitable for all ages and weights?
settings.content: The Emma Shift is suitable for all ages and weights, but we especially recommend this mattress for those who have difficulty sleeping due to firmness levels and have yet to find the perfect fit for their individual preferences.

settings.title: Is the lifespan of the Emma Shift the same as the other Emma mattresses?
settings.content: Like all Emma mattresses, the Emma Shift has undergone several durability tests to guarantee its durability. The Smart Valve is also made of high-quality acrylic glass and plastic, ensuring a lifetime guarantee.

settings.title: Shipping, Warranty, & Returns
settings.content:
Free Shipping

We work with UPS & FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns

Our risk-free 365-night trial means that you get 365 nights to relax into your Emma mattress and experience the benefits of a good night‚Äôs sleep in order to make that decision. We encourage and require a trial period of 21 nights on your mattress so that you and your body can get suited to your Emma mattress.

10-Year Warranty

Enjoy a 10-Year Warranty for each Emma mattress purchase.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-US¬Æ certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.
